com.cgoab.offline.util.resizer
Class ImageMagickResizerServiceFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.cgoab.offline.util.resizer.ImageMagickResizerServiceFactory

public class ImageMagickResizerServiceFactory
extends java.lang.Object

An asynchronous photo resizing service that saves resized photos in a local folder

This implementation invokes a new ImageMagick sub-process per resize operation. As such ImageMagik version 6.3.8-3 must be installed prior to running this or getOrCreateResizerFor(Journal) will fail with ImageMagickResizeTask.MagicNotAvailableException.
